value.fullName: 1 point for skin type I - Always Burn, never tan.
value.label: 1 point for skin type I - Always Burn, never tan.

value.fullName: 2 points for skin type II - Usuallt Bun, tan less than about average.
value.label: 2 points for skin type II - Usuallt Bun, tan less than about average.

value.fullName: 3 points for skin type III - Sometimes burns, gradually tans about average.
value.label: 3 points for skin type III - Sometimes burns, gradually tans about average.

value.fullName: 4 points for skin type IV - Sometimes burns, tans (light brown or olive skin).
value.label: 4 points for skin type IV - Sometimes burns, tans (light brown or olive skin).

value.fullName: 5 points for skin type V - Rarely burns, tans always.
value.label: 5 points for skin type V - Rarely burns, tans always.

value.fullName: 6 points for skin type VI - Deeply pigmented, never burns.
value.label: 6 points for skin type VI - Deeply pigmented, never burns.
